title: Person of Interest 5x05 Sneak Peek #2 "ShotSeeker" (HD)
author: televisionpromosdb
comment: Finch the man!!!!   machine vs samaritan! live it!
description:
Person of Interest 5x05 "ShotSeeker" - Reese protects an NYPD analyst whose investigation into a software glitch has drawn the attention of Samaritan. Also, Reese and Fusco are threatened by an ally of Elias’s, who is looking to avenge his friend’s death, on PERSON OF INTEREST, Tuesday, May 17th on CBS.
